snippet: Armstrong pleaded guilty to careless driving for hitting two parked cars with his sport utility vehicle in December in Aspen, Colo., a prosecutor said.
abstract: Lance Armstrong pleads guilty to careless driving and pays fine after hitting two parked cars in Aspen, Colo; girlfriend Anna Hansen had initially taken blame, but later admitted that Armstrong had been driving; other cycling news noted.
lead_paragraph: Armstrong pleaded guilty to careless driving for hitting two parked cars with his sport utility vehicle in December in Aspen, Colo., a prosecutor said.

headline.main: Guilty Plea in Lance Armstrong Traffic Case
headline.print_headline: Guilty Plea in Armstrong Traffic Case
